name: Image
text: Render images given as scalar data together with a color mapper.

In addition to the defined model properties, Image also can accept
a keyword argument palette in place of an explicit color_mapper.
The value should be a list of colors, or the name of one of the built-in
palettes in bokeh.palettes. This palette will be used to automatically
construct a ColorMapper model for the color_mapper property.

attrs.name: color_mapper
descs: property type: Instance ( ColorMapper  )

A ColorMapper to use to map the scalar data from image
into RGBA values for display.

attrs.name: dh
descs: property type: DistanceSpec
The height of the plot region that the image will occupy.

attrs.name: dilate
descs: property type: Bool

Whether to always round fractional pixel locations in such a way
as to make the images bigger.

This setting may be useful if pixel rounding errors are causing
images to have a gap between them, when they should appear flush.

attrs.name: dw
descs: property type: DistanceSpec
The widths of the plot regions that the images will occupy.

attrs.name: image
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The arrays of scalar data for the images to be colormapped.

attrs.name: js_callbacks
descs: property type: Dict ( String , List ( Instance ( CustomJS  ) ) )

A mapping of attribute names to lists of CustomJS callbacks, to be set up on
BokehJS side when the document is created.

Typically, rather then modifying this property directly, callbacks should be
added using the Model.js_on_change method:

attrs.name: name
descs: property type: String
An arbitrary, user-supplied name for this model.

This name can be useful when querying the document to retrieve specific
Bokeh models.

attrs.name: tags
descs: property type: List ( Any  )

An optional list of arbitrary, user-supplied values to attach to this
model.

This data can be useful when querying the document to retrieve specific
Bokeh models:

Or simply a convenient way to attach any necessary metadata to a model
that can be accessed by CustomJS callbacks, etc.

attrs.name: visible
descs: property type: Bool
Whether the glyph should render or not.

attrs.name: x
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The x-coordinates to locate the image anchors.

attrs.name: y
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The y-coordinates to locate the image anchors.
